Complex Regional Pain Syndrome: Kiwi mum with ‘most painful condition’ seeks life-changing treatment https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/complex-regional-pain-syndrome-kiwi-mum-with-most-painful-condition-seeks-life-changing-treatment/WM64NZ2INJAVNCT374SFHV6I3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/complex-regional-pain-syndrome-kiwi-mum-with-most-painful-condition-seeks-life-changing-treatment/WM64NZ2INJAVNCT374SFHV6I3E/ Heath MooreThe affliction ranked more painful than childbirth and amputation.
